Class CalculatorTest (Github)

Test class for the Calculator

package calc;

import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.*; 
import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
import org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest;
import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.Arguments;
import org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.MethodSource;   
import java.util.stream.Stream;
    
public class CalculatorTest {
    static final int ARRAYSTACKSIZE = StackTest.ARRAYSTACKSIZE;

    ( ... )
}

    • Method Details

      • calculatorProvider()

        static Stream<CalcMain> calculatorProvider()
        Provides Calculators with ArrayStack and ListStack
        
static Stream<CalcMain> calculatorProvider() {
    return Stream.of(
        new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()),
        new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE))
    );
}

        • validPostfixProvider()

        static Stream<Arguments> validPostfixProvider()
        Provides valid Postfix inputs (String[]) and their results (Double) in Pair<String[], Double> for ListStack and ArrayStack
        
static Stream<Arguments> validPostfixProvider() {
    return Stream.of(
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()), 
            new Pair<String[], Double>(new String[]{"1", "2", "+", "9", "3", "/", "+"}, 6.0)),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)), 
            new Pair<String[], Double>(new String[]{"1", "2", "+", "9", "3", "/", "+"}, 6.0)),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()),
            new Pair<String[], Double>(new String[]{"1", "2", "+", "9", "+", "3", "/"}, 4.0)),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)),
            new Pair<String[], Double>(new String[]{"1", "2", "+", "9", "+", "3", "/"}, 4.0))
    );
}

        invalidPostfixProvider()

        static Stream<Arguments> invalidPostfixProvider()
        Provides invalid Postfix inputs (String[]) for ListStack and ArrayStack
        
static Stream<Arguments>> invalidPostfixProvider() {
    return Stream.of(
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()), 
            new String[]{"1.5", "2", "+", "3", "4", "-"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)), 
            new String[]{"1.5", "2", "+", "3", "4", "-"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()),
            new String[]{"-", "1.5", "2", "+", "3", "4", "-"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)),
            new String[]{"-", "1.5", "2", "+", "3", "4", "-"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()),
            new String[]{"", "1.5", "2", "+", "3", "4", "-"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)),
            new String[]{"", "1.5", "2", "+", "3", "4", "-"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()),
            new String[]{"1.5", "2", "+", "3", "-", "-"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)),
            new String[]{"1.5", "2", "+", "3", "-", "-"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()),
            new String[]{"1", "0", "/"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)),
            new String[]{"1", "0", "/"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()),
            new String[]{"Hallo"}),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)),
            new String[]{"Hallo"})
    );
}

        validInfixProvider()

        static Stream<Arguments> validInfixProvider()
        Provides valid Infix inputs (String[]) and their results (Double) in Pair<String[], Double> for ListStack and ArrayStack
        
static Stream validInfixProvider() {
    return Stream.of(
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getListStack()), 
            new Pair<String[], Double>(new String[]{"(", "1", "+", "1", ")", "*", "2", "-", "(", "9", "/", "3", ")"}, 1.0)),
        Arguments.of(
            new CalcMain(CalcMain.getArrayStack(ARRAYSTACKSIZE)), 
            new Pair<String[], Double>(new String[]{"(", "1", "+", "1", ")", "*", "2", "-", "(", "9", "/", "3", ")"}, 1.0))
    );
}

        testCalcMain

        public void testCalcMain(CalcMain calculator)
        Tests Creation of new Calculator from @MethodSource calculatorProvider
        
@ParameterizedTest
@MethodSource({"calculatorProvider"})
public void testCalcMain(CalcMain calculator){
    assertNotNull(calculator);
}

        testValidPostfix

        public void testValidPostfix(CalcMain calculator, Pair<String[], Double> pair)
        Tests Calculation of valid Postfix inputs from @MethodSource validPostfixProvider
        
@ParameterizedTest
@MethodSource("validPostfixProvider")
public void testValidPostfix(CalcMain calculator, Pair<String[], Double> pair) {
    assertDoesNotThrow(() -> calculator.calcPostfix(pair.getFirst()));

    try {
        assertEquals(pair.getSecond(), calculator.calcPostfix(pair.getFirst()));
    } catch (CalcException e) {
        //already caught with assertDoesNotThrow
    }
}

        testInvalidPostfix

        public void testInvalidPostfix(CalcMain calculator, String[] calc)
        Tests if CalcException is thrown for invalid Postfix inputs from @MethodSource invalidPostfixProvider
        
@ParameterizedTest
@MethodSource("invalidPostfixProvider")
public void testInvalidPostfix(CalcMain calculator, String[] calc) {
    assertThrows(CalcException.class, () -> calculator.calcPostfix(calc));
}

        testValidInfix

        public void testValidInfix(CalcMain calculator, Pair<String[], Double> pair)
        Tests Calculation of valid Infix inputs from @MethodSource validInfixProvider
        
@ParameterizedTest
@MethodSource("validInfixProvider")
public void testValidInfix(CalcMain calculator, Pair<String[], Double> pair) {
    assertDoesNotThrow(() -> calculator.calcInfix(pair.getFirst()));

    try {
        assertEquals(pair.getSecond(), calculator.calcInfix(pair.getFirst()));
    } catch (CalcException e) {
        //already caught with assertDoesNotThrow
    }
}
